attributes.action: Sack Derek Conway Mp and hand the fraud to Scotland Yard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the not so honourable Derek Conway MP should be relieved of his position as a public servant, and should be handed to Scotland Yard to investigate this case of fruadulently using public funds to the benfit of his lifestyle and his families.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DerekConwayMP/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
